ComicInfo.Summary:
MINISERIES FINALE.
This is it! The double-length conclusion to the best company crossover in years. We've seen all the beloved Millarworld characters together for the first time and watched as Nemesis murdered them one by one. But is there a chink of hope somewhere he's forgotten about?
